question.title: What is a common cause of atopic dermatitis in children?
question.description: A question about the causes of atopic dermatitis

option_a.title: Viral infection
option_a.description: A possible cause of atopic dermatitis

option_b.title: Allergen exposure
option_b.description: A known trigger for atopic dermatitis

option_c.title: Genetic predisposition
option_c.description: A possible underlying factor for atopic dermatitis

option_d.title: Environmental stress
option_d.description: A potential contributor to atopic dermatitis

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: The letter of the correct answer
